title: Rocket Girl Tristana Bug?
body: *I've bought rocket girl tristana when it was on sale.. not playing tristana much, i checked her skins showing that Rocket Girl was unpurchased. i don't know why it's saying i haven't bought it, my friend had gifted me it when it was on sale and i've always had it. any way to fix this? thanks :)*

replies.body: That's a store issue, not something which can be solved on the boards. Do you have evidence of getting the gift (eg. a screenshot)?
you would think they could check purchase history of this friend to see if it was gifted.
and this is what i get when i view tristana's skin

Did your friend screen the receipt they were given when they purchased the gift? Are you able to select the skin in game?

Make a support ticket and tell Riot about all of this.
where can i make a support ticket? thank you for your help

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

It's why I'm here. Unfortunately, I can't help from this point on, as I'm not a red; I have no say in sales. You should get a robotic reply within the day from them. Be sure to keep the screens in easily accessible places.

Best of luck.
